BendixKing Channel NewsletterÂ | August 2019 <[[http://www.bendixKing.com]]> Welcome to the Family!
By now you may have heard TruTrak is now a part of the BendixKing family. TruTrak has long been a leader in the low cost and experimental autopilots and is a natural fit in the BendixKing company. Andrew Barker and many of his TruTrak employees will join the BendixKing team to continue to foster innovation and accelerate product development.
What this means for you
- As a TruTrak dealer, that primarily focuses on the experimental market you will now have access to the entire BendixKing experimental product line as well as all future experimental products. - You will have access to BendixKing marketing support programs like Co-Op, webinars, joint marketing campaigns to help build your business. - BendixKing will provide custom channel partner training on BendixKing products to assist your sales teams and installers. - You can expect a new contract in the coming weeks as part of becoming a new BendixKing channel partner.
To view the official press release please click here <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/honeywell-to-acquire-trutrak-flight-systems]]>.
Sales Information
To find out more about placing orders for the TruTrak products please contact your BendixKing area sales manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
In an effort to help experimental customer and dealers BendixKing will be opening a retail store through Honeywell GoDirect Trade for the TruTrak product line. This means that you will be able to purchase directly from BendixKing with no middlemen, simplifying your ordering process.
If you have any questions about becoming a BendixKing Channel Partner or about the acquisition please call my office at (505)-828-5423 or contact Andrew Barker at Andrew.Barker@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Andrew.Barker@Honeywell.com]]> Mobile: 479-871-1405.
Sincerely,
Lamonte Macon BendixKing Channel Manager
